FuncDef: The display transmission-alarm configuration command displays the configurations of transmission alarm customization and suppression on a specified interface. If no interface is specified, the configurations of transmission alarm customization and suppression on all interfaces will be displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command can be used to view the alarm status and alarm statistics on an interface.
Precautions
WLNK alarms are always enabled and cannot be configured. You can run only the display transmission-alarm command to view the statistics of WLNK alarms.
